pages.text: $(#630000)Sparse Chitin is a Guandao Blade Material formed from the chitinous coating of a Rupter. The blade it creates can only affect Inborn parasites.
$(#630000)It can be created either by giving a Factory Leather, or by obtaining the drops of a Rupter with a Factory.
$(#630000)This material is superceded by the Marrow Chunk.
